function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor ventilation in closed spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems, opening windows, and using mechanical ventilation","Technologies":"Mechanical ventilation systems, air conditioners","People":"Individuals in indoor spaces, especially in crowded areas","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Crowded spaces with many people","Impact":"Higher likelihood of COVID-19 transmission","Mitigation":"Limiting the number of people in a room, reducing the time spent in crowded spaces","Technologies":"Monitoring systems for people occupancy, crowd control measures","People":"Individuals in crowded spaces, event organizers","Owner":"Event organizers, facility managers"},{"Description":"Close contact","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission","Mitigation":"Encouraging physical distancing, using barriers, and promoting personal hygiene measures","Technologies":"Barriers, signage for physical distancing, hand sanitizing stations","People":"Individuals in close contact settings","Owner":"Business owners, managers"}]}
